usernameMin: The username must be 4 characters or more
usernameMax: The username must be 20 characters or less
usernameRegex: The username must contain only letters, numbers and underscore (_)
passwordMin: Your password must be 5 characters or more
passwordSpecialChars: Your password must contain at least one special character
email: Invalid email. Please enter a valid email address
emptyInput: Input cannot be an empty string
